body_html: I'm sorry about commenting so long after this was closed, but although this feature is implemented with tf.contrib.image.transform, that function does not allow gradients to backpropagate through it. So I'd call it a partial implementation.

body: I'm sorry about commenting so long after this was closed, but although this feature is implemented with tf.contrib.image.transform, that function does not allow gradients to backpropagate through it. So I'd call it a partial implementation.
